name: .MOI File Extension
summary: Learn about .MOI files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created by digital camcorders to store information about a .MOD MPEG-2 video recording; contains data such as version, date, duration, codec, and bitrate; used by a range of video recorders, including the JVC Everio series, the Canon FS100, and some Panasonic camcorders.

content: NOTE: MOI files do not contain actual video data. They are only used for describing a corresponding MOD file. To convert a MOD file to another video format, use a MOD converter program such as iOrgSoft Mod Converter.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
